about_the_game:
Put your brain to the test and see if you can beat the clock to unscramble over 50 increasingly complex erotic picture puzzles. Each unique image will present it's own challenge with the special tease of each amazingly beautiful female character revealing herself to you. Each level contains a completely different original artwork that will both excite and compel you to complete each increasingly difficult level.

All of the artwork in Sexy Sliders has been created to present players with the sexiest girls and slutty characters that will keep players engaged while playing the increasingly challenging and addictive puzzle system. We have hand selected the dirtiest images and as you progress throughout the game players will experience more revealing images to be excited by.

Sexy Sliders has been optimized for all types of computer systems to ensure that it will run lighting fast on your computer no matter the graphics specs of the device you are playing. There are over 50 increasingly difficult levels, and to complete them all you will need lighting reflexes and a steady eye to remember all the puzzle piece movements and where they can be re-assembled to see the amazing girl of your dreams.

content_descriptors.notes:
Nudity
Male / Female Genitals
Images depicting sexual intercourse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: iOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce ; ATI radeon
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: iOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce ; ATI radeon
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Sexy Sliders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Motherboard Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher

  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
